Docs.param: The name of the recovery services vault.
The name of the resource group where the recovery services vault is present.

Docs.summary: Restores the specified backed up data. This is an asynchronous operation. To know the status of this API call, use GetProtectedItemOperationResult API.
Docs.exception: Thrown when the operation returned an invalid status code
Thrown when a required parameter is null
